verses.verse: These <S%G5023><s%> words spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and lifted <S%G1869><s%> up his eyes <S%G3788><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is come; <S%G2064><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> your Son, <S%G5207><s%> that your Son <S%G5207><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may glorify <S%G1392><s%> you:

As you have given <S%G1325><s%> him power <S%G1849><s%> over all <S%G3956><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> that he should give <S%G1325><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to as many as you have given <S%G1325><s%> him.

And this <S%G3778><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> eternal, <S%G166><s%> that they might know <S%G1097><s%> you the only <S%G3441><s%> true <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you have sent. <S%G649><s%>
I have glorified <S%G1392><s%> you on <S%G1909><s%> the earth: <S%G1093><s%> I have finished <S%G5048><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me to do. <S%G4160><s%>

And now, <S%G3568><s%> O Father, <S%G3962><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> you me with your <S%G4572><s%> own <S%G4572><s%> self <S%G4572><s%> with the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had <S%G2192><s%> with you before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was.

I have manifested <S%G5319><s%> your name <S%G3686><s%> to the men <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me out of the world: <S%G2889><s%> your <S%G4671><s%> they were, and you gave <S%G1325><s%> them me; and they have kept <S%G5083><s%> your word. <S%G3056><s%>
Now <S%G3568><s%> they have known <S%G1097><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> things whatever <S%G3745><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me are of you.

For I have given <S%G1325><s%> to them the words <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me; and they have received <S%G2983><s%> them, and have known <S%G1097><s%> surely <S%G230><s%> that I came <S%G1831><s%> out from you, and they have believed <S%G4100><s%> that you did send <S%G649><s%> me.
I pray <S%G2065><s%> for them: I pray <S%G2065><s%> not for the world, <S%G2889><s%> but for them which <S%G3739><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me; for they are yours. <S%G4671><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> mine <S%G1699><s%> are yours, <S%G4674><s%> and yours <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> are mine; <S%G1699><s%> and I am glorified <S%G1392><s%> in them.

And now <S%G3765><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> but these <S%G3778><s%> are in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and I come <S%G2064><s%> to you. Holy <S%G40><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> own name <S%G3686><s%> those <S%G846><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me, that they may be one, <S%G1520><s%> as we are.

While <S%G3753><s%> I was with them in the world, <S%G2889><s%> I kept <S%G5083><s%> them in your name: <S%G3686><s%> those <S%G846><s%> that you gave <S%G1325><s%> me I have kept, <S%G5442><s%> and none <S%G3762><s%> of them is lost, <S%G622><s%> but the son <S%G5207><s%> of perdition; <S%G684><s%> that the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And now <S%G3568><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> I to you; and these <S%G5023><s%> things I speak <S%G2980><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> that they might have <S%G2192><s%> my joy <S%G5479><s%> fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in themselves. <S%G848><s%>

I have given <S%G1325><s%> them your word; <S%G3056><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> has hated <S%G3404><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
I pray <S%G2065><s%> not that you should take <S%G142><s%> them out of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but that you should keep <S%G5083><s%> them from the evil. <S%G4190><s%>
They are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
Sanctify <S%G37><s%> them through <S%G1722><s%> your truth: <S%G225><s%> your word <S%G3056><s%> is truth. <S%G225><s%>
As you have sent <S%G649><s%> me into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> even <S%G2504><s%> so have I also <S%G2504><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>
And for their sakes I sanctify <S%G37><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> that they also <S%G2532><s%> might be sanctified <S%G37><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> pray <S%G2065><s%> I for these <S%G5130><s%> alone, <S%G3440><s%> but for them also <S%G2532><s%> which shall believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me through <S%G1223><s%> their word; <S%G3056><s%>

That they all <S%G3956><s%> may be one; <S%G1520><s%> as you, Father, <S%G3962><s%> are in me, and I in you, that they also <S%G2532><s%> may be one <S%G1520><s%> in us: that the world <S%G2889><s%> may believe <S%G4100><s%> that you have sent <S%G649><s%> me.
And the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me I have given <S%G1325><s%> them; that they may be one, <S%G1520><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as we are one: <S%G1520><s%>

I in them, and you in me, that they may be made <S%G5048><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> in one; <S%G1520><s%> and that the world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that you have sent <S%G649><s%> me, and have loved <S%G25><s%> them, as you have loved <S%G25><s%> me.

Father, <S%G3962><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> that they also, <S%G2548><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me, be with me where <S%G3699><s%> I am; <S%G1510><s%> that they may behold <S%G2334><s%> my glory, <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me: for you loved <S%G25><s%> me before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

O righteous <S%G1342><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> has not known <S%G1097><s%> you: but I have known <S%G1097><s%> you, and these <S%G3778><s%> have known <S%G1097><s%> that you have sent <S%G649><s%> me.

And I have declared <S%G1107><s%> to them your name, <S%G3686><s%> and will declare <S%G1107><s%> it: that the love <S%G26><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> you have loved <S%G25><s%> me may be in them, and I in them.
